controller

Class Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.Controller

  • public class Controller
extends java.lang.Object
    A Controller to limit interaction with the model

    • Method Detail

      • addTag

        public void addTag(java.lang.String tag)
        Adds a new tag to the currently selected image. If the tag already exists, nothing is done
        Parameters:
        tag - the tag to be added

      • deleteTag

        public void deleteTag(java.lang.String tag)
        Removes a tag to the currently selected image. If the tag does not exist, nothing is done.
        Parameters:
        tag - the tag to be added

      • getAllLogs

        public javafx.collections.ObservableList<java.lang.String> getAllLogs()
        Return a ObservableList of all the logs ever logged. NOTE: This is only for the View methods! The returned list is NOT tied to the model
        Returns:
        a ObservableList of all the logs ever logged.

      • getCurrentTags

        public javafx.collections.ObservableList<java.lang.String> getCurrentTags()
        Return a ObservableList of all the tags of the currently selected image. If none is selected, returns null. NOTE: This is only for the View methods! The returned list is NOT tied to the model
        Returns:
        a ObservableList of all tags for the currently selected image.

      • getImage

        public ImageModel getImage()
        Return an ImageModel object for the currently selected image
        Returns:
        an ImageModel object for the currently selected image

      • getImageLog

        public javafx.collections.ObservableList<java.lang.String> getImageLog()
        Return a ObservableList of all the logs for this image in reverse chronological order. NOTE: This is only for the View methods! The returned list is NOT tied to the model
        Returns:
        a ObservableList of all the logs for the currently selected image.

      • moveImage

        public void moveImage(java.nio.file.Path targetDirectory)
        Move the currently selected image to the directory at the given directory path
        Parameters:
        targetDirectory - the given directory path

      • registerReferenceListener

        public void registerReferenceListener(Listener<Reference> listener)
        Registers a reference listener to the reference of this controller
        Parameters:
        listener - the reference listener for with this controller's reference

      • revert

        public void revert(int rank)
        Attempts to revert the currently selected image to the {rank}'th latest revision
        Parameters:
        rank - the rank of the revision to revert to

      • setActiveDirectory

        public void setActiveDirectory(java.nio.file.Path path)
        Set the active directory of this controller to the given path
        Parameters:
        path - the path to set the active directory of this controller to

      • setImageReference

        public void setImageReference(ImageModel img)
        Set the currently selected image to the given image
        Parameters:
        img - the new currently selected image
